name: Hyper Optic
description:
Created solo in one week for the 7DFPS Game Jam!
October 21st-28th 2018.

A First-Person Simulation and 3D Fiber Optic racing challenge.

Light is always moving. Data does not stand still.
Experience total internal reflection!

Gather speed and use precision.
Be the first to complete transmission!

~2 minutes per race.

(Flight Controls:)
-Forward acceleration is automatic & constant.
-Cursor/Mouse: Aim movement and rotation
-WASD or Arrows: Strafe up & down, left & right
-Click or Right Click: Roll left and right.
